entry.title: daomtthuan/inzect: TinyDI is a lightweight injection container for TypeScript and JavaScript. It is built on top of the Stage 3 ECMAScript Decorators proposal.
entry.content: TinyDI is a lightweight injection container for TypeScript and JavaScript. It is built on top of the Stage 3 ECMAScript Decorators proposal.

entry.title: PreetiPanda0405/WeatherAPI: A lightweight Node.js + Express API that fetches real-time weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Just hit the /weather endpoint with a city name and get back the current temperature, city name, and weather description in JSON format. Tech Stack: Node.js Express.js Axios OpenWeatherMap API
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js + Express API that fetches real-time weather data for any city using the OpenWeatherMap API. Just hit the /weather endpoint with a city name and get back the current temperature, city name, and weather description in JSON format. Tech Stack: Node.js Express.js Axios OpenWeatherMap API

entry.title: Silverellion/React-Ollama-Chat-Lite: React-Ollama-Chat-Lite is a lightweight React-based web interface that lets you easily switch between small Ollama-supported language models and chat with them in real time.

entry.title: Mudassirsulta/arwacloths: ArwaCloths is a clean and responsive eCommerce website designed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This project is a front-end design concept for an online clothing store. It includes essential features like product listings, category filters, and a modern user interface – all built with lightweight, beginner-friendly technologies.
entry.content: ArwaCloths is a clean and responsive eCommerce website designed using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. This project is a front-end design concept for an online clothing store. It includes essential features like product listings, category filters, and a modern user interface – all built with lightweight, beginner-friendly technologies.
